channel.title: Server and client hd
channel.description:
Does anyone have a good HD client and server? coz i got espeons server but it dont have any features :( and the client Josh's HD client 508 gets loads of errors in cmd but still works... but takes forever to login bout a min
If anyone has a good HD server or client plz put the link
Thanks
P.SDoes anyone know how to make a normal server HD?because i got a normal 508 server with loads of features and I dunno where to post this so mods move this to the right place
Thanks agian!
